original_text: People of other nations will help Israel's people to return to their own country. When they are living again in the land that the Lord gave to them, foreign people will become their servants, both men and women. In that way, the people who made the Israelites prisoners will be prisoners themselves! The Israelites will rule over the people who had been cruel to them.
korean_text: 민족들이 그들을 데리고 그들의 본토에 돌아오리니 이스라엘 족속이 여호와의 땅에서 그들을 얻어 노비로 삼겠고 전에 자기를 사로잡던 자들을 사로잡고 자기를 압제하던 자들을 주관하리라

sentences.original_text: People of other nations will help Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족 사람들이 이스라엘 백성을 도울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to return to their own country
When they are living again in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 땅에서 다시 살 때

sentences.original_text: that the Lord gave to them
foreign people will become their servants
the people who made the Israelites prisoners
The Israelites will rule over the people
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 그 백성을 다스릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who had been cruel to them
